meanings.definition: Becoming bald or losing hair on the head.
meanings.sent1: The balding man started wearing hats to cover his thinning hair.
meanings.sent2: Her father's balding head glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The balding barber joked that he had more hair on his chin than on his head.
meanings.sent4: The balding tree looked like it had lost its leaves permanently.
meanings.sent5: The mirror reflected the balding truth of his receding hairline.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of baldness or hair loss.
meanings.sent1: The balding cat had patches of fur missing on its back.
meanings.sent2: The old dog's balding tail wagged happily as its owner approached.
meanings.sent3: The balding teddy bear had patches of fuzz worn off from years of cuddles.
meanings.sent4: The balding mountain had lost its snowy peak to the warm weather.
meanings.sent5: The balding pillow had lost so much stuffing that it felt flat and lumpy.
